title: After movie PyCon Colombia 2021
description:
Watch the after movie of #PyConColombia2021

Don't miss it!!

PyCon Colombia 2021 was a great success. Thanks to our sponsors, collaborators, and attendees who were more than 410 individuals who made this event even bigger than we expected.

We are confident #PyConColombia2022 will be even better. In 2022 #PyConColombia will return with amazing guests from different countries, who will be happy to share their ideas, experiences, and knowledge with the community

Mira el after movie de #PyConColombia2021

¡No te lo pierdas!

PyCon Colombia 2021 fue un gran éxito y todo esto fue gracias a nuestros patrocinadores, colaboradores y a los cerca de 410 asistentes que hicieron de este evento aún mas grande de lo que esperábamos.

El equipo está trabajando fuertemente para que #PyconColombia2022 sea aún mejor y en  2022 PyCon Colombia regrese con grandes invitados de diferentes paises, los cuales estarán encantados de compartir sus ideas, experiencias y conocimientos con toda la comunidad.

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.

- playvox - https://www.playvox.com
- mercadolibre.co - https://www.mercadolibre.com.co/
- globant - https://www.globant.com/
- Elastic - https://www.elastic.co/es/
- hourly https://www.hourly.io/
- PSF - https://www.python.org/
- linode - https://www.linode.com/
- tributicolombia https://www.tributi.com/
- nokia - https://www.nokia.com/
- Avanet - http://avanet.org

Follow us

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/pyconcolombia/
Telegram: https://t.me/pyconcolombia

Do not forget to follow us on our social networks, so, you will not miss any updates.

title: Marlene Mhangami - PyCon Colombia 2022
description:
Enjoy the video of Marlene Mhangami in which she invites the entire community to participate in Pycon Colombia 2022.

Social Networks:

Github: https://github.com/marlenezw
Twitter: https://twitter.com/marlene_zw
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marlenemhangami/

Pycon Colombia 2022 in this edition brings great guests and this year we will have the participation of Marlene Mhangami, She is a director and vice-chair for the Python Software Foundation and is currently working as a Developer Advocate at Voltron Data. In 2017, she co-founded ZimboPy, a non-profit organization that gives Zimbabwean young women access to resources in the field of technology. She is also the previous chair of PyCon Africa and is an advocate for women in tech on the continent.

This is the beginning of great announcements, follow us on our social networks so you don't miss any updates.

title: Tom Christie - PyCon Colombia 2022
description:
Enjoy the video of Tom Christie in which he invites the entire community to participate in Pycon Colombia 2022.

Social Networks:

Github: https://github.com/tomchristie
Twitter: https://twitter.com/starletdreaming
Web: https://www.tomchristie.com/

Pycon Colombia 2022 in this edition brings great guests and this year we will have the participation of Tom Christie, Tom is a longstanding member of the Python open source community.

Since 2016 he has been working on open source full-time, through his company, Encode OSS.

His projects include Django REST framework, HTTPX, Uvicorn, Starlette, and more...
